casebody.data:
W. F. BROWN, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. January 15, 1924.) No. 4109. Edwin R. Holmes, Judge. Marion W. Reily and R. F. Cochran, both of Meridian, Miss., for plaintiff in error. E. E. Hindman, U. S. Atty., of Jackson, Miss. (E. E. Hindman, U. S. Atty. and Chalmers Potter, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of Jackson. Miss., on the brief), for the United States.

Before IWALKER and BRYAN, Circuit Judges, and CALL, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment in this case is affirmed.
